name: Downward Dog Spiral [Visual Novel Jam 2022]
description:
"Downward Dog Spiral" is a short visual novel where we follow  Shadow as she tries out yoga for the first time in an attempt to cope with her anger issues. It already seemed to work out for their friend Clint, though they were dealing with anxiety and not rage, not to mention everything else they were doing to cope on top of yoga.

Still, it couldn't hurt. She might even calm down a bit if all goes well. What could be more trouble than its worth, however, are the continuous attempts to antagonize her by a certain someone...

Oh yeah and they're all demons: mental health is an issue for everyone!

Made in 10 days for the Visual Novel Game Jam with the theme "Calm." There are two endings depending on your choices.

Check the credits for where the music is from -  everything else was made by me!

(Edit - Noticed a minor glitch in one of the scenes - I'll fix that as soon as the jam period ends since I can't edit files while that's going on!)
